Package com.teamfour.monopolish.game.entities

Class EntityManager

  • java.lang.Object
    • com.teamfour.monopolish.game.entities.EntityManager
  • public class EntityManager
extends java.lang.Object
    Manages all Entities in the game session. Entities are classified by players and the bank object. This class uses its arraylist of players and the bank object to handle the communication between these objects, as well as acting as an abstraction layer between all the objects and the rest of the application
    Version:
    1.4
    Author:
    eirikhem
